message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You wanted 50/50, I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give you the whole thing!
You're trying to take the majority, I'll give you a bit less, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're trying to take advantage of me, but I'll give you a bit more than my previous offer, and you can take it or leave it!
You're not giving me enough, I'll take a bit more, but I'm still willing to compromise!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about compromising, but I'll give you a bit more and see if you'll take it this time!
